comment: She is very unorganized and assigns ridiculous amounts of online homework. If you ask a question you have to be very clear about what you are asking or else she will yell at you. Overall a very rude professor who has made this class very unenjoyable. Beware!

You have to work very hard in her class to do well. She assigns a ridiculous amount of online homework and the tests are  tough as well. She is unclear about what she wants, but as long as you ask her VERY CLEARLY then you can usually get an answer out of her. Attendance and the book are mandatory. She speaks in spanish about 95% of the time.

She is HORRIBLE. Her class is so disorganized and chaotic that no one ever had any idea what was going on, or when anything was due, because she is constantly changing dates and not explaining things. She also messes up everyone's grades constantly. She teaches like it was a 3rd grade course and gets angry if you don't act like a little kid.

She really wants you to learn Spanish and has a big interest in it. Sometimes she does not make things clear and tends to be a little difficult on turning stuff in late or an abscense. Tought like my high school teacher but was pretty easy and got a B!
Professor should be educating high school students not college students.

Experienced teacher. Kinda old school. Pretty much all business but if you study and attend you should do OK. She has travelled the World and you learn more than just Spanish from her!  Don't expect this to be a pushover class because she expects you to work and learn. If you're lazy, don't bother. If you like Spanish she'll make you love it.

A complete waste of time. If you got her - drop her! You will not learn anything. Stay only if you don't have any interest in Spanish and you really enjoy being frustrated all semester. I wish I could get my money back from that class! Did I stress enough the WASTE OF TIME!!!!

Made Spanish so hard that I lost interest in it. My class started with nearly 20 students but after the first test it dropped to 7. She attempts to be nice at times but yells at students & gets mad easily. Most people felt unwelcomed and afraid to ask questions! She piles up work on you as if thats the only class you have. I made a C

She was very difficult to follow and kinda spacey. I never knew what to study so ended up reading the whole book. She expects you to already know Spanish to pass her tests! Nice lady, but avoid her if you can.
